title: CS577 (Algorithms) practice problems?
body:
To those that have taken CS577 before,

Where can I find more practice problems? Preferably with solutions. Any websites/YouTube videos, etc?

I do the questions on the textbook but there are only a few and I don’t think it’s enough to cement my understanding. Marc’s homeworks are completely from the textbook, so he doesn’t give out new questions either. I feel completely unprepared.

If you’ve taken a previous version of 577 and still have access to your homework problems, would you consider sharing it with me?
comments: Codeforces.com have algorithmic contests with detailed solutions. You can find dp, greedy, network flow problems using tags, and all problems have detailed solutions.
